blackjack

Class Mode

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.Mode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Debug, Interactive, Simulation

    public abstract class Mode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements an abstract class "Mode" that implements a common method for all the "child" classes. It has three variables also common for all the "child" classes (minimum bet, maximum bet and balance).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pedro Esteves, Ricardo Cristino, Rui Br√°s

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mode

        public Mode(java.lang.String[] args)
        This constructor gives a value to the three varibles. Their values are read form the first three arguments (args).
        Parameters:
        args - arguments typed on the command line

    • Method Detail

      • getInstruction

        public abstract java.lang.String getInstruction()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Method to be written by the classes implementing the class "Mode". It should give a String with the next action to be processed by the game.
        Returns:
        returns a String with the next instruction
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - used when the instruction is read on the command line
